itemDescription: Welsh rugby union and rugby league footballer (1995-)

wikipedia_page.main: Calvin Wellington (born 10 December 1995) is a Welsh professional rugby league footballer who plays as a centre for Oldham RLFC in Betfred League 1.

response: * Calvin Wellington (born 1995), Welsh rugby league footballer

response: On October 14, Dai Evans was brought into the squad to replace Calvin Wellington who withdrew due to a hamstring injury.DAI EVANS DRAFTED IN TO WALES' 22-MAN SQUAD, WALES RUGBY LEAGUE, 14 October 2016
Grace was born in Port Talbot, Wales, and is the brother of television personality Lateysha Grace, and cousin of rugby footballer Calvin Wellington.
